preparation.text: Anxiety is your body's alarm system.
preparation.subphrase: It will rise and fall on its own.

preparation.text: The scenarios you imagine do not necessarily reflect reality.
What you are feeling right now is temporary.

confrontation.text: Don't try to fight your thoughts, just let them pass.
Focus on what is real right now, not what might happen.
One step at a time. Just this moment.

reinforcement.text: You stayed with it, and it passed.
Worrying didn't help, but you did.
You can manage more than you think.
